title: Idle Dungeon Manager
description: Idle Dungeon Manager is an idle RPG where you manage dungeons, summon heroes, and battle monsters to collect loot. Strategically upgrade your heroes, compete in PvP battles, and explore deep dungeons to become the ultimate dungeon tycoon.

title: Idle Hiking Manager
description: Idle Hiking Manager is a tycoon game where you build and manage scenic hiking trails. Attract hikers, upgrade paths, and grow your outdoor empire to become the ultimate hiking tycoon!

title: Idle Bee Manager
description: Idle Bee Manager is a hive-building tycoon game where you manage bees, collect honey, and expand your beehive. Research new bees, optimize production, and grow your buzzing empire—even while offline!

title: Idle Convention Manager
description: Idle Convention Manager: Renewable Energy Expo is a strategic idle game where you build and manage a thriving green energy convention. Expand your expo, attract top exhibitors, and make impactful decisions to promote sustainability—all while earning passive income!

title: Idle Space Manager
description: Idle Space Manager is a tycoon game where you manage a fleet of spaceships, upgrade hangars, and earn passive income. Research new ships, automate your space business, and expand your empire beyond the stars!

title: Idle Space Clicker
description: Idle Space Clicker was an action-packed idle game where you piloted and upgraded a powerful spaceship to battle endless waves of enemies. Collect resources, enhance your ship, and become the ultimate space hero tycoon!

title: Pawsome Backery
description: Pawsome Bakery is an adorable 3D bakery game where cats run the shop and serve fellow feline customers. Bake delicious treats, prepare drinks, and upgrade your bakery to create the purrfect café experience!

title: Pawsome Click Backery
description: Pawsome Click Bakery is a charming idle game where you unlock and upgrade bakery goods to generate endless profits. Watch your bakery flourish as the money keeps rolling in!
